message: I'm being generous! Take this deal and let's finish this quickly.

Alice, I'm proposing a 50-50 split which is fair to both of us. Consider that money loses value faster for you (20% per round) than for me (5% per round). Even if you counter-offer in the next round, your share would be worth less to you due to this higher inflation rate. This equal split is optimal for both of us.
